content.html:
Here are some fantastic #comic creators I've found here on #Mastodon. Give them a follow this #FollowFriday!

- @beckycloonan - Becky Cloonan
- @davidlopez - David López
- @davecook - Dave Cook
- @gregpak - Greg Pak

Anybody else in the #ComicsIndustry out there? Let me know!

#Comics #ComicsArt #ComicsArtist
